channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 08:40 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerin of the old part
item.description: 🟠 08:40 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerin of the old part #m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
